entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
